item.title: DroneSurveyPlanner
item.description: This is a LibreOffice Calc spreadsheet designed to help you plan an aerial drone mapping survey mission.

item.title: Mask_UAV
item.description: Software to annotate, train, using deep learning, and segment imagery data from UAVs or other platforms.
